text:
Hello,

The core task "signjar" now supports filesets.
I want to be able to sign a fileset but to place the 
resulting signed-jar-file in another directory.

something like :
<signjar .... todir="./signedjars">
  <fileset dir="./jar" includes="**/*.jar"/>
</signjar>

Kees.
creator: keeskuip@technologist.com

text:
Created attachment 8376
patch of the class

creator: ads@houston.rr.com
text:
it is impossible to use signjar with filesets if one wants dependency checking.
patch attached for new filesetOutputDir property on signjar task.
*** Bug 33497 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
